trans-unit.source: Represents a ToolStripComboBox that is properly rendered in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa um ToolStripComboBox que corretamente é composto num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ToolStripComboBox is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> optimized for hosting in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripComboBox está <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>otimizada para o alojamento na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: A subset of the hosted control's properties and events are exposed at the ToolStripComboBox level, but the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control is fully accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.ComboBox%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um subconjunto de propriedades do controlo alojado e os eventos são expostos ao nível de ToolStripComboBox, mas o subjacente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>controlo é totalmente acessível através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.ComboBox%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.ComboBox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: A ToolStripComboBox displays an editing field combined with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, allowing the user to select from the list or to enter new text.
trans-unit.target: Um ToolStripComboBox apresenta um campo de edição combinado com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, permitindo que o utilizador selecione na lista ou introduza o novo texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: By default, a ToolStripComboBox displays an edit field with a hidden drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, um ToolStripComboBox apresenta um campo de edição com um oculta na lista pendente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> property determines the style of combo box to display.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>propriedade determina o estilo da caixa de combinação para apresentar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can enter a value that allows for a simple drop-down, where the list always displays, a drop-down list box, where the text portion is not editable and you must select an arrow to view the drop-down list box, or the default drop-down list box, where the text portion is editable and the user must press the arrow key to view the list.
trans-unit.target: Pode introduzir um valor que permite a um simple lista pendente, onde a lista apresenta sempre, uma caixa de lista pendente, onde a parte do texto não é editável e tem de selecionar uma seta para ver a caixa de lista pendente, ou a caixa de lista pendente predefinido, onde a parte do texto é editável e o utilizador devem premir a tecla de seta para ver a lista.

trans-unit.source: To always display a list that the user cannot edit, use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Para apresentar sempre uma lista que não é possível editar o utilizador, utilize um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: To add objects to the list at run time, assign an array of object references with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar objectos à lista em tempo de execução, atribua uma matriz de referências de objectos com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The list then displays the default string value for each object.
trans-unit.target: A lista, em seguida, apresenta o valor de cadeia predefinido para cada objeto.

trans-unit.source: You can add individual objects with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar objetos individuais com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition to display and selection functionality, the ToolStripComboBox also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the ToolStripComboBox and to find text within the items of the list.
trans-unit.target: Para além de apresentação e seleção de funcionalidades, o ToolStripComboBox também fornece as funcionalidades que lhe permitem eficientemente adicionar itens ao ToolStripComboBox e localizar texto dentro de itens da lista.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> methods enable you to add a large number of items to the ToolStripComboBox without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>métodos permitem-lhe adicionar um grande número de itens para a ToolStripComboBox sem o controlo que está a ser repainted sempre que um item é adicionado à lista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindString%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindString%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>métodos permitem-lhe procurar um item na lista que contém uma cadeia de procura específicos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property to get or set the current item in the drop-down list, and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedItem%2A> property to get or set a reference to the current item in the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>propriedade obter ou definir o item atual na lista pendente e utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedItem%2A>propriedade obter ou definir uma referência para o item atual na lista pendente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom string collection to use when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coleção de cadeia personalizado para utilizar quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource*>propriedade está definida como <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource*>

trans-unit.source: Use the AutoCompleteCustomSource, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o AutoCompleteCustomSource <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>Propriedades para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>automaticamente que conclui as cadeias de entrada ao comparar o prefixo que está a ser introduzido para os prefixos de todas as cadeias de uma origem de manter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>controlos em que os URLs, endereços, os nomes de ficheiros ou comandos serão frequentemente introduzidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: The use of the AutoCompleteCustomSource property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource> in order to use AutoCompleteCustomSource.
trans-unit.target: A utilização da propriedade AutoCompleteCustomSource é opcional, mas tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource>para poder utilizar AutoCompleteCustomSource.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: Tem de utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>Propriedades em conjunto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteStringCollection"></xref> that contains the strings.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteStringCollection"> </xref> que contém as cadeias.

trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de AutoCompleteMode obter ou definir o comportamento de conclusão automática.

trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source of complete strings used for automatic completion.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a origem das cadeias completas utilizadas para a conclusão automática.

trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade AutoCompleteSource obter ou definir cadeias de conclusão automática.

trans-unit.source: Maintains performance when items are added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref> one at a time.
trans-unit.target: Mantém o desempenho quando são adicionados itens para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref> um de cada vez.

trans-unit.source: This method prevents the control from painting until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Este método impede o controlo de desenho até o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> method through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: A forma preferencial para adicionar itens à <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>consiste em utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>método através da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.Items%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe adicionar uma matriz de itens à lista de uma só vez.

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> method, you can use the BeginUpdate method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se pretender adicionar os itens de um de cada um tempo utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>método, pode utilizar o método BeginUpdate para impedir que o controlo de novo desenho a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>sempre que um item é adicionado à lista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: Depois de concluir a tarefa de adicionar itens à lista, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>método para ativar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>para repaint.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flicker during the drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: Desta forma de adição de itens pode impedir flicker durante o desenho do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>Quando um grande número de itens está a ser adicionado à lista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> in which the user can enter text, along with a list from which the user can select.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref> no qual o utilizador pode introduzir os texto, juntamente com uma lista a partir da qual pode selecionar o utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Use the ComboBox property to get <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> properties, methods, and events that have not been wrapped into <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade da caixa de combinação para obter <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>as propriedades, métodos e os eventos que não foram eliminados em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Override the DefaultMargin property to configure a default size for your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Substituir a propriedade DefaultMargin para configurar um tamanho predefinido para a sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: This is more efficient than setting the size in the constructor.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref> atualmente apresenta a parte pendente; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Resumes painting the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref> control after painting is suspended by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.BeginUpdate*> method.
trans-unit.target: Retoma desenho a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref> controla após desenho for suspenso devido a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.BeginUpdate*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.BeginUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> method through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: A forma preferencial para adicionar itens à <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>consiste em utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>método através da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.Items%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe adicionar uma matriz de itens à lista de uma só vez.

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> method, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se pretender adicionar os itens de um de cada um tempo utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>método, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A>método para impedir que o controlo de novo desenho a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>sempre que um item é adicionado à lista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the EndUpdate method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: Depois de concluir a tarefa de adicionar itens à lista, chame o método de EndUpdate para ativar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>para repaint.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flicker during the drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: Desta forma de adição de itens pode impedir flicker durante o desenho do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>Quando um grande número de itens está a ser adicionado à lista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref> that starts with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: Localiza o primeiro item de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref> que começa com a cadeia especificada.

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: A pesquisa efetuada por este método não está maiúsculas e minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter is a substring to compare against the text associated with the items in the combo box list.
trans-unit.target: O `s` parâmetro é uma subcadeia a comparação com o texto associado os itens na lista de caixa de combinação.

trans-unit.source: The search performs a partial match starting from the beginning of the text, and returning the first item in the list that matches the specified substring.
trans-unit.target: A pesquisa executa uma correspondência parcial iniciar a partir do início do texto e devolver o primeiro item na lista que corresponde a subcadeia especificada.

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks, such as removing the item that contains the search text or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, pode realizar tarefas, tais como remover o item que contém o texto de pesquisa ou alterar o texto do item.

trans-unit.source: Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindString%2A> method to specify a starting index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Depois de encontrar o texto especificado, se pretender procurar outras instâncias do texto na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindString%2A>método para especificar um índice inicial dentro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindString%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindStringExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender efetuar uma pesquisa para obter uma correspondência exata palavra em vez de uma correspondência parcial, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.FindStringExact%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to search for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>A ser procurada</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns -1 if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do primeiro item encontrado; Devolve -1 não se for encontrada nenhuma correspondência.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the appearance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o aspeto do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the FlatStyle property to get or set the display style of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de FlatStyle obter ou definir o estilo de apresentação do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, if the FlatStyle property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>, the drop-down arrow may be resized.
trans-unit.target: Iniciando com o .NET Framework 4.5.2, se a propriedade FlatStyle estiver definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>, poderá ser redimensionada seta de lista pendente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>

trans-unit.source: Resizing is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: Redimensionamento é determinado pela definição PPP sistema quando o ficheiro App. config contém a seguinte entrada:``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The options are <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The options are <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the height, in pixels, of an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a altura, em pixels, de um item no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to return the height of.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item para devolver a altura do.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, do item no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho de uma área retangular na qual pode ser fitted um controlo.

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: A área de tamanho personalizado para um controlo.

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um par de do tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa a largura e altura do retângulo de um.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref> should resize to avoid showing partial items.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref> deverá ser redimensionada para evitar que mostre itens parciais.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the control automatically resizes to ensure that an item is not partially displayed.
trans-unit.target: Quando esta propriedade está definida como `true`, o controlo será redimensionado automaticamente para se certificar de que um item não é apresentado parcialmente.

trans-unit.source: If you want to maintain the original size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> based on the space requirements of your form, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender manter o tamanho original do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>com base nos requisitos de espaço do formulário, defina esta propriedade como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> does not contain any items, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>não contém quaisquer itens, esta propriedade não tem qualquer efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownHeight%2A> property resets the IntegralHeight property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownHeight%2A>propriedade repõe a propriedade IntegralHeight `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list portion can contain only complete items; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a parte da lista pode conter apenas itens completos; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the items contained in this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma colecção de itens contidos neste <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection of items.
trans-unit.target: Uma colecção de itens.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of items to be shown in the drop-down portion of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número máximo de itens a apresentar na lista pendente parte a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the MaxDropDownItems property to get or set the maximum number of items to show in the drop-down portion of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de MaxDropDownItems obter ou definir o número máximo de itens a mostrar na parte pendente de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items in the drop-down portion.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de itens na parte pendente.

trans-unit.source: The minimum for this property is 1 and the maximum is 100.
trans-unit.target: O mínimo para esta propriedade é 1 e o máximo é 100.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters allowed in the editable portion of a combo box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número máximo de carateres permitido na parte editável de uma caixa de combinação.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters the user can enter.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de carateres, que o utilizador pode introduzir.

trans-unit.source: Values of less than zero are reset to zero, which is the default value.
trans-unit.target: Valores inferior a zero são repostos para zero, o que é o valor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDown"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnDropDown method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnDropDown também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: O método OnDropDownClosed também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyleChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted> is raised only when the user changes the combo box selection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted>é desencadeado apenas quando o utilizador altera a seleção de caixa de combinação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectionChangeCommitted>

trans-unit.source: Do not use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> to capture user changes, because those events are also raised when the selection changes programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Não utilize <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged>para capturar as alterações do utilizador, porque esses eventos também são gerados quando a seleção é alterada através de programação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is also raised when you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este evento também é desencadeado quando definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Selects a range of text in the editable portion of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona um intervalo de texto na parte editável do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you want to set the start position to the first character in the control's text, set the `start` parameter to zero.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender definir a posição de início para o primeiro caráter no texto do controlo, defina o `start` parâmetro a zero.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to select a substring of text, such as when searching through the text of the control and replacing information.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este método para selecionar uma subcadeia do texto, como quando procura através do texto do controlo e substituir as informações.

trans-unit.source: The position of the first character in the current text selection within the text box.
trans-unit.target: A posição do primeiro caráter na selecção de texto na caixa de texto.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to select.
trans-unit.target: O número de carateres para selecionar.

trans-unit.source: The start is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O start é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: -or- start minus length is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: -or- start minus length is less than zero.

trans-unit.source: Selects all the text in the editable portion of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona todo o texto a parte editável o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index specifying the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice de especificar o item atualmente selecionado.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the zero-based index of the currently selected item in the combo box list.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade indica o índice baseado em zero do item atualmente selecionado na lista de caixa de combinação.

trans-unit.source: Setting a new index raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Definir um novo índice gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: **Note** To deselect the currently selected item, set the SelectedIndex to -1.
trans-unit.target: **Tenha em atenção** para anular a seleção do item atualmente selecionado, defina o SelectedIndex como -1.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: Um índice baseado em zero do item atualmente selecionado.

trans-unit.source: A value of negative one (-1) is returned if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Um valor negativo um (-1) é devolvido se nenhum item está selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex*>propriedade foi alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets currently selected item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o item selecionado no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you set the SelectedItem property to an object, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> attempts to make that object the currently selected one in the list.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir a propriedade SelectedItem a um objeto, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>tentativas para se certificar de que o objeto dos atualmente selecionado na lista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If the object is found in the list, it is displayed in the edit portion of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property is set to the corresponding index.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto for encontrado na lista, é apresentada na parte de editar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>propriedade está definida para o índice correspondente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If the object does not exist in the list, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property is left at its current value.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto não existe na lista, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>propriedade ficar no respetivo valor atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object that is the currently selected item or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que é o item actualmente seleccionado ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se não houver nenhum item atualmente selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is selected in the editable portion of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto que está selecionado na parte editável de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can assign text to this property to change the text currently selected in the combo box.
trans-unit.target: Pode atribuir texto para esta propriedade para alterar o texto actualmente seleccionado na caixa de combinação.

trans-unit.source: If no text is currently selected in the combo box, this property returns a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum texto atualmente selecionado na caixa de combinação, esta propriedade devolve uma cadeia de comprimento zero.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the currently selected text in the combo box.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa o texto actualmente seleccionado na caixa de combinação.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyle*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_DropDownList" name="DropDownList" href=""></xref>, the return value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyle*>está definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_DropDownList" name="DropDownList" href=""> </xref>, o valor de retorno é uma cadeia vazia ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.DropDownStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of characters selected in the editable portion of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de carateres selecionado na parte editável do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether any characters are currently selected in the combo box control before performing operations on the selected text.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para determinar se os caracteres estiverem selecionados no momento no controlo de caixa de combinação antes de efetuar operações no texto selecionado.

trans-unit.source: When the value of the SelectionLength property is set to a value that is larger than the number of characters within the text of the control, the value of the SelectionLength property is set to the entire length of text within the control minus the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionStart%2A> property (if any value is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionStart%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da propriedade SelectionLength está definido como um valor que é maior do que o número de carateres no texto do controlo, o valor da propriedade SelectionLength está definido como o comprimento do texto do controlo menos o valor de todo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionStart%2A>propriedade (se for especificado qualquer valor para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionStart%2A>propriedade).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of characters selected in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de carateres selecionado no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting index of text selected in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice de início do texto selecionado a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point for new text.
trans-unit.target: Se for selecionado sem texto no controlo, esta propriedade indica o ponto de inserção para o novo texto.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position is placed after the last character.
trans-unit.target: Se definir esta propriedade para uma localização para além do comprimento do texto no controlo, a posição inicial da seleção é colocado depois do último caráter.

trans-unit.source: When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property can release the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A alteração desta propriedade lançar quando o texto é selecionado o controlo de caixa de texto, o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the SelectionStart property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A> property, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A> property is automatically decreased.
trans-unit.target: Se o texto no controlo após a posição indicado pela propriedade SelectionStart restantes é inferior ao valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>propriedade, o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>propriedade automaticamente é diminuída.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the SelectionStart property never causes an increase in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade SelectionStart nunca provoca um aumento no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox.SelectionLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first character in the string of the current text selection.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do primeiro caráter na cadeia da selecção de texto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref> are sorted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os itens a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref> são ordenados.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> sorts existing entries and add new entries to the appropriate sorted position in the list.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade especifica se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>ordena entradas existentes e adicionar novas entradas para a posição ordenada adequada na lista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to automatically sort items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para ordenar automaticamente itens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: As items are added to a sorted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, the items are moved to the appropriate location in the sorted list.
trans-unit.target: À medida que são adicionados itens para uma ordenado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, os itens são movidos para a localização apropriada na lista ordenada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: When you set the property to `false`, new items are added to the end of the existing list.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir a propriedade `false`, são adicionados novos itens ao fim da lista existente.

trans-unit.source: The sort is case-insensitive and in alphabetically ascending order.
trans-unit.target: A ordenação é sensível e por ordem alfabética por ordem ascendente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the combo box is sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a caixa de combinação é ordenada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref> text has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref> texto foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma representação de cadeia do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox"> </xref>.
